S

SerialComm - Class in j.extensions.comm
This class provides native access to serial ports and devices without requiring external libraries or tools.
SerialComm() - Constructor for class j.extensions.comm.SerialComm
 
setBaudRate(int) - Method in class j.extensions.comm.SerialComm
Sets the desired baud rate for this serial port.
setByteSize(int) - Method in class j.extensions.comm.SerialComm
Sets the desired number of data bits per word.
setComPortParameters(int, int, int, int) - Method in class j.extensions.comm.SerialComm
Sets all serial port parameters at one time.
setComPortTimeouts(int, int) - Method in class j.extensions.comm.SerialComm
Sets the serial port read and write timeout parameters.
setNumStopBits(int) - Method in class j.extensions.comm.SerialComm
Sets the desired number of stop bits per word.
setParity(int) - Method in class j.extensions.comm.SerialComm
Sets the desired parity error-detection scheme to be used.
SPACE_PARITY - Static variable in class j.extensions.comm.SerialComm
